name: Putter
overview: Your goal on every level is to knock the potato into the hole marked by a flag. Only potato is vulnerable for the enemies and terrain obstacles.Frog steering by the player can walk through spikes, electricity and enemies with no harm. Remember, you can always restart the level by pressing the Return key on your keyboard. If you want some extra points, try to hit stars with the potato and eat flies with your frog. You can move your character left, right, up (jump, swimming and climbing the ladder) or down if you are under water. You can high kick potato using direction and Fire button or low kick using direction plus down (down-right or down-left) and Fire button. Of Course you can always push the potato, which can be the best option sometimes.
